description:
The token can be used to purchase advertising inventory on CashBag by redeeming it through the advertiser interface. The token is transferred through a smart contract in return for advertising services and the services are delivered through the platform.
The token sale will start on the 12th of March 2018 and will run for four weeks. Week 1 will have a 20% bonus, week 2 15%, Week 3 10% and week 4 0% bonus tokens.
Users earn tokens by engaging with advertisers content & purchasing from our advertisers online. Users can trade, swap & redeem tokens for products & services in our marketplace.
name: CashBagCoin
